title: Best of The Herd: 09/12/2018
itunes:title: Best of The Herd: 09/12/2018
description:
Colin explains why Bill Belichick's assistants never work out as head coaches in the NFL after reports surface that the Lions are already fed up with Matt Patricia. He thinks it’s possible that teams have simply figured out Dak Prescott and he can't adjust. Plus, The MMQB's Albert Breer talks about why Russell Wilson isn't beloved in the Seahawks locker room and why it’s too soon to judge Jimmy Garoppolo. Presented by Perky Jerky.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
